metadata.title: CVE-2024-50178 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:cpufreq: loongson3: Use raw_smp_processor_id() in do_service_request()Use raw_smp_processor_id() instead of plain smp_processor_id() indo_service_request(), otherwise we may get some errors with the driverenabled: BUG: using smp_processor_id() in preemptible [00000000] code:(udev-worker)/208 caller is loongson3_cpufreq_probe+0x5c/0x250 [loongson3_cpufreq]

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
